005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.antlr.FailingErrorListener;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.antlr.Metapath10;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.antlr.Metapath10Lexer;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.antlr.ParseTreePrinter;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.cst.BuildCSTVisitor;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.cst.CSTPrinter;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.cst.IExpression;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.cst.path.ContextItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library.FnBoolean;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library.FnData;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDecimalItem;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.INumericItem;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
024
025import org.antlr.v4.runtime.CharStreams;
026import org.antlr.v4.runtime.CommonTokenStream;
027import org.antlr.v4.runtime.DefaultErrorStrategy;
028import org.antlr.v4.runtime.Parser;
029import org.antlr.v4.runtime.misc.ParseCancellationException;
030import org.antlr.v4.runtime.tree.ParseTree;
031import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
032import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
033
034import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
035import java.io.IOException;
036import java.io.PrintStream;
037import java.math.BigDecimal;
038import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
039
040import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
041import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
042
043/**
044 * Supports compiling and executing Metapath expressions.
045 */
046@SuppressWarnings({
047    "PMD.CouplingBetweenObjects" // necessary since this class aggregates functionality
048})
049public class MetapathExpression {
050
051  public enum ResultType {
052    /**
053     * The result is expected to be a {@link BigDecimal} value.
054     */
055    NUMBER,
056    /**
057     * The result is expected to be a {@link String} value.
058     */
059    STRING,
060    /**
061     * The result is expected to be a {@link Boolean} value.
062     */
063    BOOLEAN,
064    /**
065     * The result is expected to be an {@link ISequence} value.
066     */
067    SEQUENCE,
068    /**
069     * The result is expected to be an {@link IItem} value.
070     */
071    ITEM;
072  }
073
074  private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger(MetapathExpression.class);
075
076  @NonNull
077  public static final MetapathExpression CONTEXT_NODE
078      = new MetapathExpression(".", ContextItem.instance(), StaticContext.instance());
079
080  @NonNull
081  private final String path;
082  @NonNull
083  private final IExpression expression;
084  @NonNull
085  private final StaticContext staticContext;
086
087  /**
088   * Compiles a Metapath expression string.
089   *
090   * @param path
091   *          the metapath expression
092   * @return the compiled expression object
093   * @throws MetapathException
094   *           if an error occurred while compiling the Metapath expression
095   */
096  @NonNull
097  public static MetapathExpression compile(@NonNull String path) {
098    return compile(path, StaticContext.instance());
099  }
100
101  /**
102   * Compiles a Metapath expression string using the provided static context.
103   *
104   * @param path
105   *          the metapath expression
106   * @param context
107   *          the static evaluation context
108   * @return the compiled expression object
109   * @throws MetapathException
110   *           if an error occurred while compiling the Metapath expression
111   */
112  @NonNull
113  public static MetapathExpression compile(@NonNull String path, @NonNull StaticContext context) {
114    @NonNull MetapathExpression retval;
115    if (".".equals(path)) {
116      retval = CONTEXT_NODE;
117    } else {
118      try {
119        Metapath10Lexer lexer = new Metapath10Lexer(CharStreams.fromString(path));
120        lexer.removeErrorListeners();
121        lexer.addErrorListener(new FailingErrorListener());
122
123        CommonTokenStream tokens = new CommonTokenStream(lexer);
124        Metapath10 parser = new Metapath10(tokens);
125        parser.removeErrorListeners();
126        parser.addErrorListener(new FailingErrorListener());
127        parser.setErrorHandler(new DefaultErrorStrategy() {
128
129          @Override
130          public void sync(Parser recognizer) {
131            // disable
132          }
133        });
134
135        ParseTree tree = ObjectUtils.notNull(parser.expr());
136
137        if (LOGGER.isDebugEnabled()) {
138          try (ByteArrayOutputStream os = new ByteArrayOutputStream()) {
139            try (PrintStream ps = new PrintStream(os, true, StandardCharsets.UTF_8)) {
140              ParseTreePrinter printer = new ParseTreePrinter(ps);
141              printer.print(tree, Metapath10.ruleNames);
142              ps.flush();
143            }
144            LOGGER.atDebug().log(String.format("Metapath AST:%n%s", os.toString(StandardCharsets.UTF_8)));
145          } catch (IOException ex) {
146            LOGGER.atError().withThrowable(ex).log("An unexpected error occurred while closing the steam.");
147          }
148        }
149
150        IExpression expr = new BuildCSTVisitor(context).visit(tree);
151
152        if (LOGGER.isDebugEnabled()) {
153          LOGGER.atDebug().log(String.format("Metapath CST:%n%s", CSTPrinter.toString(expr)));
154        }
155        retval = new MetapathExpression(path, expr, context);
156      } catch (MetapathException | ParseCancellationException ex) {
157        String msg = String.format("Unable to compile Metapath '%s'", path);
158        LOGGER.atError().withThrowable(ex).log(msg);
159        throw new StaticMetapathException(StaticMetapathException.INVALID_PATH_GRAMMAR, msg, ex);
160      }
161    }
162    return retval;
163  }
164
165  /**
166   * Construct a new Metapath expression.
167   *
168   * @param path
169   *          the Metapath as a string
170   * @param expr
171   *          the Metapath as a compiled abstract syntax tree (AST)
172   * @param staticContext
173   *          the static evaluation context
174   */
175  protected MetapathExpression(
176      @NonNull String path,
177      @NonNull IExpression expr,
178      @NonNull StaticContext staticContext) {
179    this.path = path;
180    this.expression = expr;
181    this.staticContext = staticContext;
182  }
183
184  /**
185   * Get the original Metapath expression as a string.
186   *
187   * @return the expression
188   */
189  @NonNull
190  public String getPath() {
191    return path;
192  }
193
194  /**
195   * Get the compiled abstract syntax tree (AST) representation of the Metapath.
196   *
197   * @return the Metapath AST
198   */
199  @NonNull
200  protected IExpression getASTNode() {
201    return expression;
202  }
203
204  /**
205   * Get the static context used to compile this Metapath.
206   *
207   * @return the static context
208   */
209  @NonNull
210  protected StaticContext getStaticContext() {
211    return staticContext;
212  }
213
214  @Override
215  public String toString() {
216    return CSTPrinter.toString(getASTNode());
217  }
218
219  /**
220   * Evaluate this Metapath expression without a specific focus. The required
221   * result type will be determined by the {@code resultType} argument.
222   *
223   * @param <T>
224   *          the expected result type
225   * @param resultType
226   *          the type of result to produce
227   * @return the converted result
228   * @throws TypeMetapathException
229   *           if the provided sequence is incompatible with the requested result
230   *           type
231   * @throws MetapathException
232   *           if an error occurred during evaluation
233   * @see #toResultType(ISequence, ResultType)
234   */
235  @Nullable
236  public <T> T evaluateAs(@NonNull ResultType resultType) {
237    return evaluateAs(null, resultType);
238  }
239
240  /**
241   * Evaluate this Metapath expression using the provided {@code focus} as the
242   * initial evaluation context. The required result type will be determined by
243   * the {@code resultType} argument.
244   *
245   * @param <T>
246   *          the expected result type
247   * @param focus
248   *          the outer focus of the expression
249   * @param resultType
250   *          the type of result to produce
251   * @return the converted result
252   * @throws TypeMetapathException
253   *           if the provided sequence is incompatible with the requested result
254   *           type
255   * @throws MetapathException
256   *           if an error occurred during evaluation
257   * @see #toResultType(ISequence, ResultType)
258   */
259  @Nullable
260  public <T> T evaluateAs(
261      @Nullable IItem focus,
262      @NonNull ResultType resultType) {
263    ISequence<?> result = evaluate(focus);
264    return toResultType(result, resultType);
265  }
266
267  /**
268   * Evaluate this Metapath expression using the provided {@code focus} as the
269   * initial evaluation context. The specific result type will be determined by
270   * the {@code resultType} argument.
271   * <p>
272   * This variant allow for reuse of a provided {@code dynamicContext}.
273   *
274   * @param <T>
275   *          the expected result type
276   * @param focus
277   *          the outer focus of the expression
278   * @param resultType
279   *          the type of result to produce
280   * @param dynamicContext
281   *          the dynamic context to use for evaluation
282   * @return the converted result
283   * @throws TypeMetapathException
284   *           if the provided sequence is incompatible with the requested result
285   *           type
286   * @throws MetapathException
287   *           if an error occurred during evaluation
288   * @see #toResultType(ISequence, ResultType)
289   */
290  @Nullable
291  public <T> T evaluateAs(
292      @Nullable IItem focus,
293      @NonNull ResultType resultType,
294      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
295    ISequence<?> result = evaluate(focus, dynamicContext);
296    return toResultType(result, resultType);
297  }
298
299  /**
300   * Converts the provided {@code sequence} to the requested {@code resultType}.
301   * <p>
302   * The {@code resultType} determines the returned result, which is derived from
303   * the evaluation result sequence, as follows:
304   * <ul>
305   * <li>BOOLEAN - the effective boolean result is produced using
306   * {@link FnBoolean#fnBoolean(ISequence)}.</li>
307   * <li>NODE - the first result item in the sequence is returned.</li>
308   * <li>NUMBER - the sequence is cast to a number using
309   * {@link IDecimalItem#cast(IAnyAtomicItem)}.</li>
310   * <li>SEQUENCE - the evaluation result sequence.</li>
311   * <li>STRING - the string value of the first result item in the sequence.</li>
312   * </ul>
313   *
314   * @param <T>
315   *          the requested return value
316   * @param sequence
317   *          the sequence to convert
318   * @param resultType
319   *          the type of result to produce
320   * @return the converted result
321   * @throws TypeMetapathException
322   *           if the provided sequence is incompatible with the requested result
323   *           type
324   */
325  @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.NullAssignment", "PMD.CyclomaticComplexity" }) // for readability
326  @Nullable
327  protected <T> T toResultType(@NonNull ISequence<?> sequence, @NonNull ResultType resultType) {
328    Object result;
329    switch (resultType) {
330    case BOOLEAN:
331      result = FnBoolean.fnBoolean(sequence).toBoolean();
332      break;
333    case ITEM:
334      result = sequence.getFirstItem(true);
335      break;
336    case NUMBER:
337      INumericItem numeric = FunctionUtils.toNumeric(sequence, true);
338      result = numeric == null ? null : numeric.asDecimal();
339      break;
340    case SEQUENCE:
341      result = sequence;
342      break;
343    case STRING:
344      IAnyAtomicItem item = FnData.fnData(sequence).getFirstItem(true);
345      result = item == null ? "" : item.asString();
346      break;
347    default:
348      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(null, String.format("unsupported result type '%s'", resultType.name()));
349    }
350
351    return ObjectUtils.asNullableType(result);
352  }
353
354  /**
355   * Evaluate this Metapath expression without a specific focus.
356   *
357   * @param <T>
358   *          the type of items contained in the resulting sequence
359   * @return a sequence of Metapath items representing the result of the
360   *         evaluation
361   * @throws MetapathException
362   *           if an error occurred during evaluation
363   */
364  @NonNull
365  public <T extends IItem> ISequence<T> evaluate() {
366    return evaluate((IItem) null);
367  }
368
369  /**
370   * Evaluate this Metapath expression using the provided {@code focus} as the
371   * initial evaluation context.
372   *
373   * @param <T>
374   *          the type of items contained in the resulting sequence
375   * @param focus
376   *          the outer focus of the expression
377   * @return a sequence of Metapath items representing the result of the
378   *         evaluation
379   * @throws MetapathException
380   *           if an error occurred during evaluation
381   */
382  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
383  @NonNull
384  public <T extends IItem> ISequence<T> evaluate(
385      @Nullable IItem focus) {
386    return (ISequence<T>) evaluate(focus, new DynamicContext(getStaticContext()));
387  }
388
389  /**
390   * Evaluate this Metapath expression using the provided {@code focus} as the
391   * initial evaluation context.
392   * <p>
393   * This variant allow for reuse of a provided {@code dynamicContext}.
394   *
395   * @param <T>
396   *          the type of items contained in the resulting sequence
397   * @param focus
398   *          the outer focus of the expression
399   * @param dynamicContext
400   *          the dynamic context to use for evaluation
401   * @return a sequence of Metapath items representing the result of the
402   *         evaluation
403   * @throws MetapathException
404   *           if an error occurred during evaluation
405   */
406  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
407  @NonNull
408  public <T extends IItem> ISequence<T> evaluate(
409      @Nullable IItem focus,
410      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
411    try {
412      return (ISequence<T>) getASTNode().accept(dynamicContext, ISequence.of(focus));
413    } catch (MetapathException ex) { // NOPMD - intentional
414      throw new MetapathException(
415          String.format("An error occurred while evaluating the expression '%s'.", getPath()), ex);
416    }
417  }
418}
